channel.description: Is it possible to hide widget-level filters when dashboard-level filters are used? Otherwise the UI is very cluttered with duplicate dropdowns. ![redash_global_filters|690x304](upload://eLI7GnNx3fqk8rSdjjCwA6yNwOK.png)
